translation.No Passeio Carioca, cada passo é uma nov: In Passeio Carioca, every step is a new discovery and every discovery deserves recognition. As you explore the charms of Rio and complete the circuits by checking in, you earn exclusive medals. These medals are not only symbols of your adventures, but also keys that can unlock unique rewards and special offers. The more you explore, the more you earn. Ready to start your collection?
translation.Explore a cidade com nossos passeios gui: Explore the city with our personalized guided tours. Our experienced tour guides will take you on a unique journey, sharing fascinating stories and well-kept secrets of the city's most iconic sights.
translation.Transforme sua experiência de turismo em: Turn your tourism experience into an exciting adventure! Explore the city's incredible sights and collect digital medals along the way. With our gamification feature, every place you visit becomes a unique achievement. Take a photo, check in on the app and earn your medals. The more places you visit, the more medals you earn!
translation.Descubra a cidade como nunca antes com n: Discover the city like never before with our geolocated map. Explore points of interest around you and delve into the history of each location. Click on the map pins to read about the history of the location, interesting facts and exclusive tips from our local experts.
translation.Descubra o turismo de uma maneira nova c: Discover tourism in a new way with our app!
translation.Explore os pontos turísticos incríveis d: Explore the city's incredible sights and collect digital medals along the way. With our gamification feature, every place you visit becomes a unique achievement. Take a photo, check in on the app and earn your medals. The more places you visit, the more medals you earn!
translation.Baixe agora e comece a sua jornada de tu: Download now and start your tourism journey with an extra dose of fun and rewards!
translation.Explore o Rio de Janeiro com ele na palm: Explore Rio de Janeiro with it in the palm of your hand
translation.Se você quer conhecer um pouco mais da h: If you want to learn a little more about the history of Rio by walking through its streets, alleys and avenues, you've come to the right place!
translation.Aqui você encontra informações sobre mai: Here you will find information about more than 1200 cultural points in the city to plan your visit. You can study them before leaving home, or if you are walking down the street and come across a historic building or relevant point in the city, click on the icon and learn more about it.
translation.A função de “geolocalização” está dispon: The “geolocation” function is available, so you will be able to interact with some of the points registered in the Passeio Carioca app, you will have all the information available.
translation.Aqui alguns dos pontos que pode encontra: Here are some of the points you can find in the app
translation.Conheca mais sobre os pontos no App Pass: Learn more about the points in the Passeio Carioca App
translation.No Passeio Carioca, cada passo é uma nov: In Passeio Carioca, every step is a new discovery and every discovery deserves recognition. As you explore the charms of Rio and complete the circuits by checking in, you earn exclusive medals. These medals are not only symbols of your adventures, but also keys that can unlock unique rewards and special offers. The more you explore, the more you earn. Ready to start your collection?
translation.Junte-se a nos como guia parceiro: Join us as a partner guide
translation.Você é um guia turístico apaixonado por: Are you a tour guide passionate about sharing the secrets and wonders of our city? Join us and become a partner in our tourism platform! Join us and be part of a community of guides passionate about tourism, sharing your knowledge and enthusiasm with travelers from around the world! Register now and start turning your passion into a unique tourism experience!
translation.Alcance Mais Clientes: Promova Seu Negóc: Reach More Customers: Promote Your Business with Passeio Carioca!
translation.Contaremos a historia do seu estabelecim: We will tell the story of your establishment and highlight it on our map
translation.Plano Bronze + inclusão do “Viva essa ex: Bronze Plan + inclusion of the “Live this experience”, with a link to your social network or a QR code, which can include a discount or a prize for the tourist or resident of the city
translation.Plano Bronze + Plano Prata + inclusão do: Bronze Plan + Silver Plan + inclusion of your establishment in the gamification of the application, with the possibility of the tourist checking in person at the location and sharing on their social networks
translation.Plano Bronze + Plano Prata + Plano Ouro: Bronze Plan + Silver Plan + Gold Plan + inclusion of your establishment in one of the guided in-person tours
translation.Temos um compromisso em oferecer o melho: We are committed to providing the best service and ensuring that your experience exploring Rio de Janeiro is unforgettable. If you have any questions, suggestions, or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our team is ready to help you discover all the wonders that Rio has to offer.
translation.O melhor app de passeios do Rio de Janei: The best tour app in Rio de Janeiro!
